tool_description: Categorizes comedy material by style, topic, audience appropriateness, and performance requirements, enabling systematic organization of setlists.

material_text.description: Text content of the comedy material to categorize

interaction_level.description: Level of audience interaction required (none, minimal, moderate, high)

error_messages: Empty material: material_text cannot be empty or contain only whitespace.
Invalid performance time: performance_time_minutes must be greater than 0 and less than 60.
Invalid interaction level: Must be one of 'none', 'minimal', 'moderate', or 'high'.
usage: Provide comedy material text and performance details to receive comprehensive categorization for venue matching and setlist planning.

topic_tags.description: Subject matter tags for the material
